title: Sri Lanka Rupee appreciates against Russian Ruble
content: The Sri Lanka Rupee has appreciated to 2.40 rupees to the Russian ruble from 2.66 earlier this week.It comes after Russia invaded Ukraine, and the European Union, United Kingdom, United States and Canada have announced sanctions against Russiaâ€™s central bank.The Ruble has been falling against the Sri Lanka Rupee from around 2.90 rupees in October 2021.
